channel.title: pointer on Tianyi as a Developer
channel.description: Recent content in pointer on Tianyi as a Developer

item.title: Borrowing and Ownership in Rust
item.description: Slice Slices fn main() { let mut x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]; let r = &mut x; if let Some((first, rest)) = r.split_first_mut() { *first = 100; rest[0] = 99; rest[1] = 98; } assert_eq!(x, [100, 99, 98, 4, 5]) } Deref Coersion in Functions fn main() { let v = 5; let r = &v; let r2 = &r; println!("{}, {}", is_five(r), is_five(r2)) } fn is_five(val: &i32) -> bool { *val == 5 } ## true, true Smart Pointers Deref Coersion From The Book:
